detailed_profile.about: I am an accomplished professional delivering 28 years of career success in spearheading multi-functional roles encompassing Strategic Channel Sales, Business Development & Marketing, P&L Management, Client Relationship Management across Retail Insurance & Investment and Bio Medical Disposables industry. My dexterity lies in analyzing markets, industry trends, competitors & clients for achieving business growth objectives, optimizing the entire value chain of business and ensuring the achievement of the targeted top & bottom-line. Demonstrated excellence in building strategic alliances & breaking new avenues to open an opportunity for accessing new channel partners & dealers, new markets, new customer acquisitions, prospective leads, reviving the existing clients, providing macro & micro level insights & so on. Over the time, I have proved my excellence in spearheading the strategic growth of key accounts by developing and implementing tailored account plans; successfully secured multiple new key accounts and expanded the client portfolio which contributed towards the overall company growth; attained acceleration in annual sales & revenue by identifying cross-selling & upselling opportunities within key accounts. Key Achievements: ‚Ä¢ I‚Äôve mastered the administration of ensuring high levels of client satisfaction & retention by proactively addressing their needs, resolving issues & providing innovative solutions; fostered strong client relationships, turning key clients into advocates who referred new business opportunities, leading to an increase in client retention & referrals. ‚Ä¢ Excellent at steering the complete sales cycle from initial unqualified lead to proposal, managing competition, evaluation & support issues, commercials, price negotiation and closure.

detailed_profile.name: Gouse Mohiddin Jilani
detailed_profile.position: Joint Managing Director at Shriram Finance Limited | In the Finance Industry for over 30+ Years
detailed_profile.about: I have 30+ years of experience in retail financial Services of which 10 years of experience in chit fund management. Started as a management trainee in 1992, it has been a great journey to this position with hard work, dedication and passion for my work. I have been part of Shriram group since it's business development stages which has given me opportunities to grow and expand its operations from the scratch. This opportunity taught me professional skills like leadership, entrepreneurship, handling compliance issues around different cities of India. I believe that hard work, focus and commitment is the biggest driving force to be successful in life and one should exercise it professionally and personally. I am a high-energy, result-oriented person with interest in travel and socialising. Specialties: Retail finance ( two wheeler finance, pre-owned car finance, small ticket personal & business loans),Small and Medium Enterprises (SME), Life & General Insurance, Asset Backed Finance in Commercial Vehicles, Construction Equipment, Sales, Credit, Collections, Controls and P&L responsibilities.

detailed_profile.position: Deputy Credit Manager at Shriram Finance Ltd
detailed_profile.about: Overview of job responsibility at Present: Preparing Credit Appraisal Memo (CAM) for CV,FW,TR PL, STBL and Two-Wheeler Loan. Perform Credit and reference checking TVR, IRR, Dedupe, EVR and RVR. Conduct Personal Discussion (PD) with customers to evaluate credit worthiness. Verifying and study of financial And Legal documents i.e. ITR, P&L sheet, balance sheet, KYC Docs etc. Proper watching and follow up on Login, Approval, Disbursal, Rejection, Deviation on monthly basis. Preparing MIS sheet on daily and monthly basis. Implementation of Credit Policy and Compliance of policy with processes. Ensuring and co-coordinating with other to maintain TAT. Post Disbursal activity like EMI reminder to Avoid Non-starter, provide foreclosure and settlement figure as per customer requirement. With direct guidance, assists with risk management efforts for the assigned credit risk focus, such as Credit Analysis & Approval/Portfolio Management, Operational Credit Risk, Country Risk or Credit Administration. Helps with the development of documentation and reporting. Supports each team's adherence to the risk management strategy of the assigned credit risk discipline. Primary duty for each discipline is as follows: Credit Analysis & Approval/Portfolio Management: With direct guidance, assists with analyses of industry, country and counter party credit portfolios and credit portfolio quality. May interact with portfolio managers, as directed. Trained to underwrite credit transactions and manage credit relationships
